en.title: World Class Sports Personalities At FE's HQ BEP Wed 23 April 2008
en.content:
FE’s HQ BEP on Wed 23 April 2008 was packed with Leaders, Members and invited guests. World Class Sports personalities who attended and shared their testimonies include:-
  • Shalin Zulkifli ( World Bowling Champion )
  • Bathi Allimuthu ( World Kick Boxing Champion )
  • Jean Daniels ( International Golf Long Drive Specialist )
  • Surech Kuppusamy ( World Class Mountaineer )
Thank you everyone for making the BEP a GREAT SUCCESS !
